name: Keep Moving Forward (TheShadyColombian)
description:
Keep Moving Forward is a small Arcade game I made,  representing the idea of moving forward instead of getting stuck in the past, no matter what obstacles may come your way. It's also one of the few games I've made with a win condition instead of just being an endless Score Attack game.

Tips/How To Play: 

  • Click/touch and drag rail tracks to swap them. 
  • Tracks on fixed (orange) tiles cannot be swapped. 
  • Falling off either side of the tracks, or doing a u-turn  will be a game over
  • Signs counting down on either side of the tracks indicate the finish rail will be coming up on that side
  • To win, make sure you get on the exit track to reach the finish
  • If you miss the finish, more will show up further down the road
  • Purposefully missing finish lines can lead to a higher score
  • Dying will forfeit your score, and it will not be considered as a high score

Music is Stage 1 by SawSquareNoise
